{{also|社赛}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=社赛}}

===Etymology===
short for: [[春社|春'''社''']] or [[秋社|秋'''社''']] + [[迎神賽會|迎神'''賽'''會]]
: This festival is observed on the 5th day which begins with ''Yang earth'' ([[戊]]) (see [[w:Sexagenary cycle|Sexagenary cycle]]), after [[w:lichun|lichun]] and [[w:liqiu|liqiu]] respectively.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=shèsài
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} a [[village]] [[festival]] [[celebrating]] the [[w:Tu Di Gong|earth god]]
